definition: heaven on Earth/nickname for the city Suzhou
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
day/sky/heaven

(main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture

sentences.english: What about Maldives? It is known as a paradise on earth.
sentences.chinese: 那么马尔代夫怎么样？那里被称为人间天堂。

sentences.english: It is known as a paradise on earth.
Such is her beauty that, like Hangzhou, the city of Suzhou has often been called an "Earthly Paradise".
sentences.chinese: 正如杭州一样，苏州也因其美丽而常被称作人间天堂。

sentences.english: Increasing foreplay time will lead to anticipation of the big event.
sentences.chinese: 增加前戏时间，会将你带入绝美无伦的人间天堂。

sentences.english: Sri Lanka is a protean and wonderful paradise.
sentences.chinese: 斯里兰卡是一个千变万化和精彩万分的人间天堂。

sentences.english: Hangzhou is a vertable heaven on earth.
sentences.chinese: 杭州是名副其实的人间天堂。

sentences.english: The 175 acres of field and woodland at the Children's International Village is a heaven on earth.
sentences.chinese: 国际儿童村的175英亩田野和林地的确是人间天堂。

sentences.english: Julia said. “It’s like heaven on earth!”
sentences.chinese: 茱莉亚说，“简直像个人间天堂。”

sentences.english: Natural god Xiu , Scenery fluttering flags , Is known as "Heaven on earth Fine reputation ".
sentences.chinese: 自然神秀，山水旖旎，素有“人间天堂之美誉”。

definition: see 桃花源[tao2 hua1 yuan2]
lit. there is heaven above, and there is 蘇杭|苏杭[Su1 Hang2] below (idiom)/fig. the beauty and affluence of Suzhou and Hangzhou is comparable with heaven
pinyin: shang4 you3 tian1 tang2 , xia4 you3 Su1 Hang2

fairyland/wonderland/paradise
tourist center
scenic lakes and mountain (idiom); beautiful lake and mountain landscape
well-known scenic spot

wonderful scenery
